animeTitle: Chiisana Koi no Monogatari: Chichi to Sally Hatsukoi no Shiki
otherNames: 小さな恋のものがたり チッチとサリー初恋の四季
synopsis: Tiny schoolgirl Chiiko develops a crush on older boy Saly and believes herself to be his girlfriend, although Saly is already involved in a love triangle with a girl called Tonko.
